channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Constant dumping of household rubbish on the street, 3rd December
item.description:
Us business rates payers are not happy. Rubbish dumped on a daily basis outside our premises. Problem is NEVER resolved. FYI NONE of this waste is being deposited by the local businesses.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Goldsmiths Row, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 67-53 Bayham Street, 3rd December
item.description:
Hello, we are all affected by the poor road condition leading to the buildings shaking whenever buses pass, day and night. From what I understand after speaking with neighbours, the affected area runs from 67 Bayham Street to 53.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55-57, Bayham Street, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in the middle of the road, 3rd December
item.description:
Pothole in the middle of the road (next to the 1-hour parking bays). This area has had potholes in previous years and seems to need repatching regularly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Salisbury Road, Bexley, Greater London

item.title: Multiple vehicles parked on yellow lines blocking junction, 3rd December
item.description:
Several vans (including an Royal Greenwich Council Van!) are continually parked at this junction causing an obstruction and danger. They have been several accidents and many near misses.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bostall Hill, Abbey Wood

item.title: Mud and leaves covering footpath, 3rd December
item.description:
Please could someone come and clean the footpath that goes around the perimeter of the play area in Poverest Park as it is covered in mud and leaves which is not particularly pleasant for anyone trying to walk or push a push chair/mobility scooter around this area. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clovelly Way, Crofton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 3rd December
item.description:
Herbert Road (Herbert Terrace) another fly tipping problem, continues every day. The area looks disgusting with black bins lining the street. Must we live in this continual mess?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Herbert Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead sapling, 3rd December
item.description:
Greenwich council planted this tree 3 or more years ago. It’s dead and it needs to be replaced with a healthy sapling (not just tarmac’d over) Can we get a healthy specimen please. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beaconsfield Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet
